name: ROMANA 5-Row Crystal Sash
description:
This gorgeous bridal sash is made with 5 rows of sparkly rhinestones attached to a double sided satin ribbon that ties in the back.This sash will add lots of "bling" to a simple wedding dress.

Choice of white,off white,light ivory or ivory satin ribbon.For other colors please contact me.

The sash is 1" wide and the length of the rhinestone piece is approx.17"-18".(Please contact me for a quote if you need more inches of the crystal piece).
The complete sash measures 3 yards for easy sizing.

Orders of 3 or more of this item will receive 15% discount.

Current production time is 7-10 days.Please contact me before ordering,if you need your item sooner.

This item ships priority mail within US(2-3 business days) and first class internationally(approx.2 weeks,depending on location).

Please contact me with any questions,for multiples of this item or insured shipping.

If you are in need of wedding planning services-photography,decorations,packages-please visit our site SunKissWedding.com-serving St. Petersburg,Clearwater,Sarasota,Tampa Fl.

Thank you!!

name: BRIE Braided Crystal Sash
description:
Super sparkly braided rhinestone beading is attached to a double sided satin ribbon that ties in the back.This sash is gorgeous.You will look stunning wearing this sash on your wedding day.

Choice of white,bridal white,ivory or silver double sided satin ribbon.For other ribbon colors please contact me.

The sash is approx.1 inch wide and the length of the rhinestone piece is 18"(please contact me for a quote if you need more inches of the beaded part).
The complete sash measures 3 yards for easy sizing.

name: JULIE Crystal Bridal Headband
description:
This gorgeous bridal headband is made with super sparkly rhinestones and beads attached to a double sided satin ribbon ties.The ends of the ribbon are finished with a beaded oval on both sides.Simple and beautiful.You will look stunning wearing this headband on your wedding day.

Choice of white,off white,light ivory,ivory or pewter satin ribbon.
Please contact me if you have a different ribbon color in mind.

The headband is approx.1/2" wide and the length of the rhinestone piece is 15".
Satin ribbon ties are 20" long on each side.

Orders of 3 of the same headbands or more will receive 15% discount.

Current production time is 7-10 days.Please contact me before ordering,if you need your item sooner.

This item ships priority mail within US(2-3 business days) and first class internationally(approx.2 weeks,depending on location).

name: LUCY Double Crystal Bridal Headband
description:
This gorgeous bridal headband is made with 2 rows of super sparkly rhinestones and beads attached to a double sided satin ribbon that ties in the back of your neck.The ends of the ribbon are finished with a beaded oval on each side.
Simple and beautiful.You will look stunning wearing this headband on your wedding day.

Choice of white,off white,light ivory,ivory or pewter satin ribbon.Please contact me if you have a different ribbon color in mind.

Each row of crystals is approx.1/2" wide and the length of the rhinestone piece is 15".
The satin ribbon is 20" long on each side.

Orders of 3 of the same headbands or more will receive 15% discount.

Current production time is 7-10 days.Please contact me before ordering,if you need your item sooner.
